sentences.en: According to Hellenic myth, general deity? Zeus has a grandiose temple on Olympus.
sentences.cn: 古希腊神话中, 总神 宙斯 在奥林匹克山上有一座规模宏大的神庙.

sentences.en: Antarctica has always inspired grandiose schemes.
sentences.cn: 南极洲总是激发人们的宏伟设想.

sentences.en: As the fog vanished, a grandiose landscape unfolded before the tourists.
sentences.cn: 雾气散去之后, 一幅壮丽的景观展现在游客面前.

sentences.en: Chopin did not feel that his delicate technique and intricate melodies were as suited to the grandiose hall as they were to smaller environments and audiences.
sentences.cn: 肖邦认为他细致优美的演奏技巧和纷繁的旋律更适合小环境演奏，而不适合宏伟的音乐厅。

sentences.en: Daqing oil management board developed congress to depict grandiose blue print.
sentences.cn: 大庆石油管理局发展大会描绘了宏伟的蓝图.

sentences.en: Have grandiose aims but puny abilities, great ambition but little talent.
sentences.cn: 眼高手低, 志大才疏.

sentences.en: In reality, the audience for France's grandiose initiatives has been shrinking fast.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 法国宏伟抱负的拥护者,正在迅速减少.

sentences.en: She attacked her colleagues for indulging in "grandiose and grandiloquent language".
sentences.cn: 她抨击同事“言辞浮夸做作”。

sentences.en: She had some grandiose ( ie overambitious ) plan to start up her own company.
sentences.cn: 她有个野心勃勃的大计画,想独立创办公司.

sentences.en: Such impressiveness usually takes the form of a truly grandiose realism.
sentences.cn: 这种感人的情景通常采用真实的蔚为壮观的写实主义手法表现出来.

sentences.en: Such impressiveness usually takes the form of truly grandiose realism.
sentences.cn: 这种感人情景通常采用真正宏伟的现实主义形式.

sentences.en: Tanglewood Mountain raises its grandiose peaks to the heavens in majestic beauty and tranquility.
sentences.cn: 宏伟高耸入云的泰高活山脉呈现一片优美和宁静.

sentences.en: The lack of such leaders may also be the hallmark of a largely post-ideological era in which far less need is felt for unifying doctrines or the grandiose figures who provide them.
sentences.cn: 这种领袖人物的缺乏可能也是一个大后意识形态时代的重要象征，在这个时代，人们更少需要一个统一的教义或是一个提供给大众的浮夸形象。

sentences.en: The phrase gestures towards grandiose achievement that is out of reach for almost everybody.
sentences.cn: 这个短语用以表示的宏伟成就,是几乎所有人都无法达到的.

sentences.en: These proposals have nothing to do with grandiose schemes for reinventing market capitalism.
sentences.cn: 这些提议与改造市场资本主义的宏伟计划毫不相干。

sentences.en: This idea will never amount to anything ; nothing came of his grandiose plans.
We must do away with the grandiose style of work.
sentences.cn: 我们必须摈弃浮夸的工作作风.

sentences.en: Your skin sees glorious . " The barber did a grandiose declaration . "
sentences.cn: 理发师做出了唯一 夸大其词 的评论.

words.tran_cn: 宏伟的；堂皇的；浮夸的；宏大的

trans.tran_cn: 宏伟的，浮夸的，壮阔，沾沾自喜
trans.tran_en: grandiose plans sound very important or impressive, but are not practical
